Minister.Text: Minister of Industry, in relation to Ontario (SI/91‑100); Minister of Health, in relation to Quebec (SI/91‑100); Minister for the purposes of the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency Act, in relation to the Atlantic provinces (SI/88‑178); Minister of Western Economic Diversification, in relation to the Western provinces (SI/88‑115)

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 11 (4th Supp.) in force 28.06.88 see SI/88‑119
